Header: Prime Minister says counter terrorism law will replace PTA
Content: Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe says that a counter terrorism law will be introduced instead of the Prevention of Terrorism Act. The Prime Minister made this statement at a joint press briefing with his New Zealand Counterpart, John Key in Auckland. The establishment of a High Commission of New Zealand in Sri Lanka as well as making Sri Lanka a hub for the sport of rugby in the Asian region were discussed at this joint press briefing.
